summary: Hosted by twice Oscar nominated actor Woody Harrelson, Ethos explores the mechanisms in our systems that work against democracy, the environment and our own personal liberty.
cast: Woody Harrelson|Justin Lewis|Bill Hogan|Noam Chomsky|Tony Benn|Howard Zinn|Ray Anderson|Samuel Epstein|Jane Akre|Robert Monks|Sam Gibara|Ira Jackson|Pat Jackson|Peter Levy|Ann Bernays|Stuart Ewen|John McCain|Charles Lewis|Dan Briody|Cynthia McKinney|Scott Ritter|Edward Said|Norman Solomon|Karen Kwiatkowski|Stan Goff|Daniel Ellsberg|Robert Jensen|Bernie Sanders|Chalmers Johnson|Benjamin Barber|Mark Danner|Marc Barry|Edward Bernays|Michael Bloomberg|Laura Bush|Robert Byrd|Dick Cheney|Connie Chung|Winston Churchill|Bill Clinton|Hillary Clinton|Dwight D. title: Ethos
